obscure_tooltips.configuration.enabled.t: Whether Obscure Tooltips should be active at all.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.contentMa: The margin (in pixels) between the tooltip frame and its content.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.ignoredIt: List of item IDs that should be ignored by Obscure Tooltips.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.AutoWrapp: Options for wrapping overly long lines.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.autoWrapp: Whether Obscure Tooltips should wrap lines in tooltips.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.Scrolling: Options for scrolling overly long tooltips.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.scrollEna: Whether long tooltips should become scrollable when they exceed the screen height.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.scrollSpe: How fast the tooltip scrolls when using the mouse wheel.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.scrollMar: Extra spacing (in pixels) above and below tooltip when scrolling is enabled.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.armorPrev: Whether Obscure Tooltips should display 3D armor previews.
List of item IDs that should always display a 3D armor preview.
List of item IDs that should never display a 3D armor preview.
obscure_tooltips.configuration.toolPrevi: Whether Obscure Tooltips should display 3D tool/weapon previews.
List of item IDs that should always display a 3D tool/weapon preview.
List of item IDs that should never display a 3D tool/weapon preview.
